mapper.sql: id, name, director, screenwriter, starring, type, language, releasedate, length, synopsis, img, rating
mapper.insert:
insert into movieinfo
id,
name,
director,
screenwriter,
starring,
type,
language,
releasedate,
length,
synopsis,
img,
rating,

mapper.update:
update movieinfo
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
director = #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
screenwriter = #{screenwriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
starring = #{starring,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
releasedate = #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER},
synopsis = #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rating = #{rating,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update movieinfo set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, director = #{director,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, screenwriter = #{screenwriter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, starring = #{starring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, releasedate = #{releasedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, length = #{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}, synopsis = #{synopsis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(1) from movieinfo where name = #{name}
